types.name: personal
types.description: Fireworks intended for recreational use during holiday celebrations

types.name: professional
types.description: High grade fireworks intended for professionals in controlled areas.

types.name: Chinese
types.description: These are available only to those who `know a guy`

types.name: military
types.description: These explosives are used to take down small buildings such as homes and small businesses.

types.name: commercial
types.description: These explosives are used to take down medium sized buildings such as apartment buildings or office buildings.

types.name: experimental
types.description: These explosives are used to take down large buildings such as malls and skyscrapers.
